pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.dicom

Class Information

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.dicom.Information

  • public class Information
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides several helper functions for retrieving information about a DICOM file.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileFromSOPInstanceUID

        public static StorageInputStream getFileFromSOPInstanceUID(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID)
        Based on a SOP Instance UID, returns a File handler for the respective .dcm file. This method issues all available query providers, see getFileFromSOPInstanceUID(java.lang.String, java.util.List) to select specific providers
        Parameters:
        sopInstanceUID - a String containing a valid/indexed SOP Instance UID.
        Returns:
        a File handler for the respective .dcm file if the SOP Instance UID is valid and indexed, null otherwise.

      • getFileFromSOPInstanceUID

        public static StorageInputStream getFileFromSOPInstanceUID(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID,
                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> providers)
        Based on a SOP Instance UID, returns a File handler for the respective .dcm file.
        Parameters:
        sopInstanceUID - a String containing a valid/indexed SOP Instance UID.
        providers - a list of query sources to issue the file handler (if null, all enabled providers are queried)
        Returns:
        a File handler for the respective .dcm file if the SOP Instance UID is valid and indexed, null otherwise.

      • searchForFileIndexedMetaData

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> searchForFileIndexedMetaData(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID)
        Based on a SOP Instance UID returns a hash table containing all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file. This method issues all available query providers, see getFileFromSOPInstanceUID(java.lang.String, java.util.List) to select specific providers.
        Parameters:
        sopInstanceUID - a String containing a valid/indexed SOP Instance UID.
        Returns:
        a Hashtables containing all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file if the SOP Instance UID is valid and indexed, null otherwise.

      • searchForFileIndexedMetaData

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> searchForFileIndexedMetaData(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID,
                                                                                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> providers)
        Based on a SOP Instance UID returns a hash table containing all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file.
        Parameters:
        sopInstanceUID - a String containing a valid/indexed SOP Instance UID.
        providers - a list of query sources to issue the tables
        Returns:
        a Hashtables containing all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file if the SOP Instance UID is valid and indexed, null otherwise.

      • getXMLTagListFromFile

        public static java.lang.String getXMLTagListFromFile(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID)
        Based on a SOP Instance UID returns a String containing a XML document filled with all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file. This method will query all enabled sources.
        Parameters:
        sopInstanceUID - a String containing a valid/indexed SOP Instance UID.
        Returns:
        a String containing a XML document filled with all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file if the SOP Instance UID is valid and indexed, null otherwise.

      • getXMLTagListFromFile

        public static java.lang.String getXMLTagListFromFile(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID,
                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> providers)
        Based on a SOP Instance UID returns a String containing a XML document filled with all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file.
        Parameters:
        sopInstanceUID - a String containing a valid/indexed SOP Instance UID.
        providers - a list of query sources to issue the document
        Returns:
        a String containing a XML document filled with all name and value tag pairs for the respective .dcm file if the SOP Instance UID is valid and indexed, null otherwise.

      • getFrameRateFromImage

        public static float getFrameRateFromImage(java.lang.String sopUID)

      • getNumberOfFramesInFile

        public static int getNumberOfFramesInFile(java.lang.String sopInstanceUID)
